rev.desc.rev.desc: recompile to solve date format issue.
Redesign Export to Excel to not use DDE.
Change this rad to a wrapper of us.dump.delimited.
The parameter $INTO.ARRAY and $INTO.LANG are deprecated.
Panel start
if (type($INTO.FORMAT)~=2) then ($L.format.record=$INTO.FORMAT) else ($L.format.record=get.base.form.name($INTO.FORMAT))
to
if (type($INTO.FORMAT)~=2) then ($L.format.record=$INTO.FORMAT) else ($L.format=get.base.form.name($INTO.FORMAT))
Added condition to bypass reprocessing row if OLD style qbe.
Changed to nullsub blank language support to English.
Modified to externalize the dde language support.
Added Polish and Italian support.
No code change - recompiled for new parameter added to dde.export.fetchrows.

if (type($INTO.FORMAT)~=2) then ($L.format.record=$INTO.FORMAT) else ($L.format.record=get.base.form.name($INTO.FORMAT)) was incorrect on start panel as if (type($INTO.FORMAT)~=2) then ($L.format.record=$INTO.FORMAT) else ($L.format=get.base.form.name($INTO.FORMAT)) the record was left of the else variable. Plus the displayoption had to be changed for incidents because it was sending a label of a form instead of the form using $L.dd.format
Change German code from "ge" to "de"
more French stuff.
More language changes for French
Always start from the top of the list and return to the current position after.
Added support for the German version of Excel.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.

Added line to start panel to set the filename of the list being exported for later usage if the qbe format is non-existant so the we can build it if needed. Added cleanup to the "cleanup panel to get rid of the previously established variable.

descript.descript: recompile to solve date format issue.
Redesign Export to Excel to not use DDE.
Change this rad to a wrapper of us.dump.delimited.
The parameter $INTO.ARRAY and $INTO.LANG are deprecated.
Panel start
if (type($INTO.FORMAT)~=2) then ($L.format.record=$INTO.FORMAT) else ($L.format.record=get.base.form.name($INTO.FORMAT))
to
if (type($INTO.FORMAT)~=2) then ($L.format.record=$INTO.FORMAT) else ($L.format=get.base.form.name($INTO.FORMAT))
Added condition to bypass reprocessing row if OLD style qbe.
Changed to nullsub blank language support to English.
Modified to externalize the dde language support.
Added Polish and Italian support.
No code change - recompiled for new parameter added to dde.export.fetchrows.

if (type($INTO.FORMAT)~=2) then ($L.format.record=$INTO.FORMAT) else ($L.format.record=get.base.form.name($INTO.FORMAT)) was incorrect on start panel as if (type($INTO.FORMAT)~=2) then ($L.format.record=$INTO.FORMAT) else ($L.format=get.base.form.name($INTO.FORMAT)) the record was left of the else variable. Plus the displayoption had to be changed for incidents because it was sending a label of a form instead of the form using $L.dd.format
Change German code from "ge" to "de"
more French stuff.
More language changes for French
Always start from the top of the list and return to the current position after.
Added support for the German version of Excel.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.

Added line to start panel to set the filename of the list being exported for later usage if the qbe format is non-existant so the we can build it if needed. Added cleanup to the "cleanup panel to get rid of the previously established variable.
